resources.string: create table userInfo(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,userName varchar(50))
create table userFavorites(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,userFavoriteUrl varchar(255))
create table userShopCar(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,shopCarItemUrl varchar(50))
create table userWareHouses(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,wareHouseItemUrl varchar(50))
